{
    "number": 191135,
    "data": "1,4,13,16,40,49,52,64,121,148,157,160,193,196,208,256,364,445,472,481,484,580,589,592,625,628,640,769,772,784,832,1024,1093,1336,1417,1444,1453,1456,1741,1768,1777,1780,1876,1885,1888,1921,1924,1936,2308,2317,2320,2353,2356,2368,2497,2500,2512,2560,3073,3076",
    "name": "Increasing sequence generated by these rules:  a(1)=1, and if x is in a then 3x+1 and 4x are in a.",
    "comment": [
        "See A191113."
    ],
    "link": [
        "Reinhard Zumkeller, <a href=\"/A191135/b191135.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000</a>"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "h = 3; i = 1; j = 4; k = 0; f = 1; g = 9;",
        "a = Union[Flatten[NestList[{h # + i, j # + k} &, f, g]]]   (* A191135 *)",
        "b = (a - 1)/3; c = a/4; r = Range[1, 1500];",
        "d = Intersection[b, r] (* A191136 *)",
        "e = Intersection[c, r] (* A191195 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(Haskell)",
        "import Data.Set (singleton, deleteFindMin, insert)",
        "a191135 n = a191135_list !! (n-1)",
        "a191135_list = f $ singleton 1",
        "   where f s = m : (f $ insert (3*m+1) $ insert (4*m) s')",
        "             where (m, s') = deleteFindMin s",
        "-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 01 2011"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A191113."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "1,2",
    "author": "_Clark Kimberling_, May 28 2011",
    "references": 3,
    "revision": 8,
    "time": "2013-07-13T12:04:10-04:00",
